name: Core Extensions Bundle
excerpt: Save Big & Get access to all core BaloonUp Maker extensions + all future extensions by purchasing our massively discounted extensions bundle.

name: Exit Intent BaloonUps
excerpt: Easily turn abandoning users into cash! Exit Intent opens a baloonup when users attempt to leave your site.

name: BaloonUp Analytics
excerpt: Create high performance baloonups with Analytics - get up-to-the-minute statistical information on impressions, conversions, and more.

name: Advanced mySkin Builder
excerpt: Build more powerful and influential myskins for your baloonups - this extension allows you to add background images to different elements of your baloonup.

name: Age Verification Modals
excerpt: Streamline and enhance your user experience, and protect your content from unqualified users using the Age Verification Modals Extension.

name: Scroll Triggered BaloonUps
excerpt: Use this extension and market your valuable content as users scroll down your pages - great for increasing revenue and funneling users throughout your site.

name: AJAX Login Modals
excerpt: Use this Extension in a variety of ways and streamline and enhance your user experience. Great for protecting content or preventing access without logging in on your site.

name: Forced Interaction
excerpt: Disabling the close button can be used in a variety of ways, from protecting content or areas of your site to forcing users to complete an action before continuing.

name: Secure Idle User Logout
excerpt: Use this extension to securely log users out once they have entered an idle state. Display a warning and automatically logout if they don't respond.

name: Advanced Targeting Conditions
excerpt: Target specific sets of your users with new conditions such as Mobile Detection, User Roles & Login Checks, Users from Google, custom conditions & more.

name: Terms & Conditions BaloonUps
excerpt: Require users to agree to your terms & conditions before viewing pages, clicking buttons & more. Great for forcing agreement prior to clicking add to cart.

name: Remote Content
excerpt: Managing dozens of baloonups? Replace them all with a dynamic solution. Convert a list of links into baloonups in no time. Creating single page apps is a breeze.

name: MailChimp Integration
excerpt: With this extension, you can now easily and quickly add a sign up form to your baloonups to add users to your mailing list in MailChimp.

name: Aweber Integration
excerpt: With this extension, you can now easily and quickly add a sign up form to your baloonups to add users to your mailing list in Aweber.

name: Scheduling
excerpt: Add scheduling options to your baloonups. With multiple schedule types, you can precisely schedule your baloonups in just a few minutes.

name: Videos
excerpt: Create the ultimate MandarinCMS Video BaloonUp for your marketing videos in minutes - customize your player, control video play/pause commands, and much more.
